short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Brings the refreshing vibe of a natural forest

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ew-covered leaves, perfect for a calm, nature-inspired browsing experience. This theme is designed to create a tranquil atmosphere, with deep green shades that highlight the beauty of nature.

Key features:
- Beautiful background.
- Quick access to frequently visited sites.
- Customizable search bar and shortcuts.
- Real-time weather display and clock.
